title: Have whispers, ocd about impurity and ends up washing the whole body - Assim al hakeem
transcript: he has again whispers in purity and he is led to wash his whole body and i asked him specifically does he see any impurity he says no it's just a feeling the feeling does not count and these are whispers of shaytan you don't see it it doesn't exist but i feel i believe i think maybe perhaps all of these are whispers from shaytaan throw them in the dustbin you
